sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_VEHL_GUBN', 3, '승상구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_INDS_CODE', 4, '업종', 'CHAR', '2', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_COME_CODE', 5, '공법코드', 'CHAR', '4', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_APPL_DATE', 6, '적용일', 'CHAR', '8', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_SEQ0', 7, 'SEQ', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_PROD_MIN0', 8, '년간생산수량 MIN', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_PROD_MAX0', 9, '년간생산수량 MAX', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_PROD_NAME', 10, '생산갯수구분명', 'VARCHAR', '30', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_LOTQ_NAME', 11, 'LOT량 구분명', 'VARCHAR', '30', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_DETL_NAME1', 12, 'LOT량 세부구분명', 'VARCHAR', '30', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_DETL_NAME2', 13, 'LOT량 상세구분명', 'VARCHAR', '30', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_QTY0', 14, 'LOT량', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '100', 'Y', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_UPDT_DATE', 15, '수정일', 'CHAR', '8', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_UPDT_CMAN', 16, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_INIT_DATE', 17, '등록일', 'CHAR', '8', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CITBLOTQ', 'LOTQ_INIT_CMAN', 18, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 14:36:38', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CITBLOTQ ( LOTQ_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4) ,LOTQ_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,LOTQ_VEHL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,LOTQ_INDS_CODE CHAR(2) ,LOTQ_COME_CODE CHAR(4) ,LOTQ_APPL_DATE CHAR(8) ,LOTQ_SEQ0 NUMBER(10, 0) ,LOTQ_PROD_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 0) ,LOTQ_PROD_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 0) ,LOTQ_PROD_NAME VARCHAR(30) ,LOTQ_LOTQ_NAME VARCHAR(30) ,LOTQ_DETL_NAME1 VARCHAR(30) ,LOTQ_DETL_NAME2 VARCHAR(30) ,LOTQ_QTY0 NUMBER(10, 0) ,LOTQ_UPDT_DATE CHAR(8) ,LOTQ_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) ,LOTQ_INIT_DATE CHAR(8) ,LOTQ_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) ,CONSTRAINT CITBLOTQ_PK PRIMARY KEY(
) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
SELECT * FROM CITBLOTQ WHERE LOTQ_CORP_CODE = 'K1' AND LOTQ_STND_GUBN = 'H' AND LOTQ_VEHL_GUBN = 'P' AND LOTQ_INDS_CODE = 'RB' AND LOTQ_COME_CODE = 'HOSE'
